Docs.summary: Resolves design-time data-binding for the specified control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control are data-bound. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to "DataBound". If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to a text string so the control will have the appearance of a working hyperlink.
## Examples The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. It resolves design-time data binding for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property of the `CustomHyperLink` class so that placeholder text is displayed for the property when it is data-bound at design time.
